metadata.title: CVE-2018-5704 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Open On-Chip Debugger (OpenOCD) 0.10.0 does not block attempts to use HTTPPOST for sending data to 127.0.0.1 port 4444, which allows remote attackersto conduct cross-protocol scripting attacks, and consequently executearbitrary commands, via a crafted web site.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5704` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openocd - 0.9.0-1+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openocd package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.0-1+deb8u1build0.16.04.1').
